sentences.cn: 有关媒体报道武警和防暴警察到场已经制止了事态的进一步扩大.

sentences.en: He has the typical reportorial manner.
sentences.cn: 他有一种典型的记者派头。

sentences.en: Showed concerned bush fire is newest on the side of these maps reportorial link.
sentences.cn: 这些地图旁边显示了有关野火最新报道的链接.

sentences.en: That's the opposite of pumping out a bunch of unsubstantiated allegations and then leaving it to readers to "make up their own minds" about them with no reportorial guidance.
sentences.cn: 这与抛出一堆未经证实的指控，不提供任何报道指向，让读者自己去“判断”的做法正好相反。

sentences.en: The astonishing distrust of the news media isn't rooted in inaccuracy or poor reportorial skills but in the daily clash of world views between reporters and their readers.
sentences.cn: 对于新闻媒体惊人的不信任，其根源不在于不准确报道和蹩脚的报道技巧，而在于记者和其读者之间世界观的冲突。

trans.tran_en: of or relating to a newspaper reporter
